attributes.action: Allow people that have had a Cov19 infection to be treated as Fully Vaccinated
attributes.additional_details: The following BMJ article contains links to scientific evidence to support infected persons having equal or more protection from the virus than a fully vaccinated person. https://www.bmj.com/content/374/bmj.n2101/rr-0
attributes.background: Pass legislation that enshrines in law that a person whom has had a Covid -19 infection of any strain, historically or in the future, receives the same freedoms and rights, including right to work, right of access or any other restriction as a 'Fully vaccinated' person.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Recognise immune response to Covid-19 in the Covid pass:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600576
